import millify from 'millify' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Row, Col } from 'antd' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Cryptocurrencies = ({market}) =>{ const [coins, SetCoins] = useState(market.coins) console.log(coins) return( <> {coins.map((currency)=>{ } hoverable>

Price: {millify(currency.price)}

Market Cap: {millify(currency.marketCap)}

Daily Change: {currency.change}%

 })} ) } export default Cryptocurrencies
